titleStmt.title: One sheet (or second letter) concerning the difference in some points which is between our united brethren, in order to accommodation
titleStmt.author: Humfrey, John, 1621-1719.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for T. Parkhurst near Mercers-Chappel,

notesStmt.note: The "Mr. Williams" of the text is Daniel Williams, the non-conformist divine; the text Humfrey is challenging has not been identified.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford.
